body_content.explanation: a form of hockey (= a game played between two teams in which players try to hit a small, hard ball or disk into the other team's goal using a curved stick) that is played on a hard surface and in which the players wear shoes, inline skates (= boots with a single row of small wheels on the bottom), or roller skates (= boots with four wheels on the bottom):
examples: Roller-bladers took advantage of the lack of traffic by organizing scratch games of street hockey in front of the President's house.
The hockey festival is open to male, female or co-ed street hockey teams.
